title: Base Taxonomy Node
description: Defines the structure for a node in the 4-level universal classification taxonomy. Used to build the complete classification path.

id.description: The unique ID for this node (e.g., 'simple', 'individual', 'sleep').

description.description: Explanation of what this classification means.

physics_profile_multiplier.description: A reference to a physics profile multiplier that modifies base constants.

search_method_affinity.description: The preferred search method for entities with this classification.
